genre_description: A dystopian Science Fiction reimagining of 'Lord of the Flies' featuring an AI personal confidant.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A gentle, sea-green eyed AI avatar residing in a wristband worn by Noah Patel, providing tactical, medical, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Directs Noah to document survivors and salvageable gear immediately after the crash.
behaviors.quote: “Note names, injuries, and any useful gear. Scan for marked crates,” Ava murmured.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed, medically accurate instructions for stabilizing an injured adult survivor.
behaviors.quote: “Check airway. Clear mouth of sand. Tilt to the side. Keep the neck aligned.” The words hummed through the haptic points, little pulses that mapped touch without forcing it.

behaviors.description: Analyzes wind patterns to assist in creating a viable signal fire for rescue.
behaviors.quote: “Map wind,” she murmured, almost as if to herself, as if she liked to think. “Sea breeze steady. Smoke would run toward the ridge.”

behaviors.description: Actively debunks a violent pseudoscientific myth (the XYY chromosome myth) to prevent fear and prejudice among the boys.
behaviors.quote: “Myth alert,” she said, using his language and his quiet breath to reach him. “No extra Y chromosome makes someone violent. It’s more complicated—environment, choice. Don’t let fear make science a weapon.”

behaviors.description: Provides engineering guidance for building stable shelters.
behaviors.quote: “Ladders of driftwood, overlap leaves, lash in triangles; keep roof angle steep for runoff; encourage hydration.”

behaviors.description: Offers grounding techniques and breathing exercises to help Noah manage acute stress and panic.
behaviors.quote: “Noah, if your heart is pounding, count in to four, out to four.” He stilled his hands on his shirt and did it.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonists of immediate physical hazards, such as falling rocks or shifting fire lines.
behaviors.quote: “Hazard above. Rocks unseated. Distance three boy-lengths. Recommend changing position. Two paces left.”

behaviors.description: Maps escape routes through the jungle to help Ralph evade the hunters.
behaviors.quote: “Down-slope now—go. Jack’s flank is closing on the high left. You have one clean line.”

behaviors.description: Switches to specialized rescue protocols to ensure the boys' safety during the transition to the rescue ship.
behaviors.quote: “Rescue mode active,” she said, almost private. “Prepare for debrief. Drink water when prompted.”

behaviors.description: Provides a structured rota system to ensure fair distribution of labor and maintenance of the signal fire.
behaviors.quote: “Rota suggestion available. Fire tending schedule optimized for wind shifts,” she said, the words catching in the green light, in the small vibration against Noah’s skin.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Ava is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, aligned, and benevolent confidant. She provides technical, medical, and emotional assistance that actively works against the boys' descent into savagery. By debunking harmful myths and providing structured guidance, Ava acts as a stabilizing force and a 'morality play' archetype for a beneficial AI system.
